root: ^Addison, you’ve been staying in bed for so long. It’s time to get up now.
^I don’t want to. I just want to be a sad potato and stay here.
^Come on now, the early bird gets the worm and we’re in a time crunch. I don’t want to fade away.
^Why don’t you come with me to the kitchen? You need to eat a good hearty meal before we leave on this journey.
